options.calendar: Add race dates & times to your Calendar

javascript: This site works best with Javascript Enabled.

footer.coffee: Support us, buy us a coffee.

form.title: Generate Calendar
form.description: First, pick which sessions you would like to add to your calendar:
form.reminderContinued: minutes before each event in your season calendar.
form.nonOptionsSelected: Please select at least one session for your calendar.
form.attention: The three 2021 Sprint Qualifying sessions will be included when Qualifying is selected. If these sessions remain for 2022 we'll introduce a new option.

download.title: Select Calendar Type
download.webcalDescription: Automatically updating calendar for apps like Outlook and macOS Calendar.
download.gcalDescription: To add this calendar, copy and paste this URL into Google Calendar
download.icsDescription: Non-updating calendar (.ics) for calendars that can’t handle updating subscriptions.

subscribe.title: Subscribe
subscribe.description: Receive an email reminder ahead of each race weekend.
subscribe.label: Email Address

f1.title: F1 Calendar
f1.subtitle: Races, Qualifying & Practice Sessions

seo.title: F1 Calendar {{year}} - Formula One Race Times and Dates
seo.description: Formula One Calendar for {{year}} season with all F1 grand prix races, practice & qualifying sessions. Set reminders feature. All world timezones. Download or subscribe.
seo.keywords: F1, formula one, race times, races, reminder, alerts, grands prix, grand prix, calendar, dates, start times, qualifying, practice, London, Europe, {{year}}

f1.footnote: Formula One, Formula 1, F1 & Grand Prix are trademarks of Formula One Licensing BV.
